summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 51, Yesler's 2nd Addition to Seattle, Supplemental, being the alley between 24th Avenue and 25th Avenue, from East Howell Street to East Denny Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14391 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
